definitions.definition: A religious recluse ; someone who lives alone for religious reasons; an eremite .
A recluse ; someone who lives alone and shuns human companionship .
A spiced cookie made with molasses , raisins , and nuts .
Any in the subfamily Phaethornithinae of hummingbirds .

main_definition: A religious recluse ; someone who lives alone for religious reasons; an eremite .
secondary_definitions: A recluse ; someone who lives alone and shuns human companionship .
A spiced cookie made with molasses , raisins , and nuts .
Any in the subfamily Phaethornithinae of hummingbirds .
